name: Shan's Salty Seamen
description:
Use your sultry singing voice to help merman Shan lure sailors to their doom!

Microphone recommended. This is not that appropriate for kids... there is raunchiness and some blood & gore.

Credits

Design, art, merman voice and programming by Shan, Oth, Kevin, David
Music and sound FX by Michael @ Tree of Audio
Recording by Llewellyn @ Tree of Audio
Pitch detection by https://pitchtracker.codeplex.com/
